entry.title: Start of a Design Workflow
entry.content:
Talk

When you get a new assignement for a design work, talk about it with its Product Owner.

He will always have ideas and insights, data, people you should talk to…

Write

Then, write down your first ideas, sketches, make a basic report with the “State of the art”, existing functionalities and dreamed ones… It will help you define what your design needs to work.

At this point you can iterating, with sketches, text or whatever low-fidelity medium you like :–)
